title: As BOC, I want player flagged a rookie until he has 45 Active roster days
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN a rookie player's MJ roster status is active for a total of 45 days before--not including 'Roster expansion' date (system date) 

*Note: this requirement can be earned over multiple seasons. For example 20 days can be earned in the 2015 season and the remaining 25 days can be earned in the 2016 season
custom_expected:
THEN the player is no longer flagged a rookie
AND date of reaching rookie milestone is populated on the service tab of his profile.

title: As BOC, I want player to be flagged rookie until he reaches at-bats of 130 or pitched 50 innings
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN a player reaches his cumulative major league at-bats of 130 or innings pitched of 50 (before reaching 45 days of MJ service; i.e. the service based check)


*Note: The requirement can be earned over multiple seasons.
custom_expected:
THEN the player is no longer flagged a rookie
AND the date of reaching the rookie milestone is populated on the service tab of his profile.

title: As BOC, I can see a list of Rookies on whom to calculate rookie service
custom_steps: WHEN "Rookie Calculations" batch is run in report mode
custom_expected:
THEN show a list of all players with at least one MJ transaction and who have not already crossed rookie milestone in a previous season

**Columns for Results table:**
- Player ID
- Player Name
- Current Org
- Current Club
- MJ Roster Status
- Rookie Milestone Crossed (leave blank if not yet crossed)
- Days toward Rookie Milestone (Number of active days that count toward Rookie milestone based on last batch run. Cap at 45. If part of the milestone was achieved in a previous season, ETL the number over from ebis 1)
- At-Bats (later story)
- Innings pitched (later story)

title: As BOC, I want to know when a player reaches his 3 yr milestone
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN a player earns 3 years of MLS and the 3 year milestone is crossed.
custom_expected: THEN populate the date of reaching 3 Year milestone on the service tab of his profile.

title: As BOC, I want to know when a player reaches his 5 yr and 6 yr milestone
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN a player earns 5 and 6 years of MLS and the 5 and 6 year milestones are crossed.
custom_expected: THEN populate the date of reaching the 5 and 6 Year milestones on the service tab of his profile.

title: As BOC, I want to know when a player reaches his 10/5 milestone
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
1) WHEN a player earns 10 years of MLS total AND 5 years of MLS consecutive with the current team that he is on.

2) WHEN a player leaves the team (released or FA), or becomes voluntarily retired, deceased or unconditionally released

3) WHEN a player signs with another Major league team

4) WHEN a player moves around to the minor leagues with the same ORG or re-signs with the same Org, the milestone continues from where
custom_expected:
1) THEN the 10/5 year milestone is reached
AND the date is populated on the service tab of his profile

2) THEN the 10/5 year milestone date gets cleared from the service page (but not reset in the backend)

3) THEN the 10/5 year milestone gets completely reset

4) THEN the 10/5 year milestone continues from where it left off

title: As BOC, I want to see a list of players on whom to calculate service milestones
custom_steps: WHEN "Service Milestone calculations" batch is run in report mode
custom_expected:
THEN show a list of all Major league pro players who have had a service accruing Major League roster status at least once at any point during the current season

**Columns for Results table:**
- Player ID
- Player Name
- Current Org
- Current Club
- MJ Roster Status
- 3 year (show current value from profile. If projected, show "projected - mm/dd/yyyy)
- 5 year (show current value from profile. If projected, show "projected - mm/dd/yyyy)
- 10/5 year (show current value from profile. If projected, show "projected - mm/dd/yyyy)

title: As BOC, I want to project when a player will reach his milestones
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
AND making assumption that each player will get a day of service for every remaining day of the rest of the current season (up to and including Last Day of Season in system dates)
custom_steps:
1)WHEN the player will reach his 3 yr, 5 yr, 6 yr or 10/5 yr date within the current season

2) WHEN the player cannot reach the milestone within the season
custom_expected:
1) THEN show "Projected - mm/dd/yyyy" with the future date on which player will reach the milestone in the Service tab

2) THEN leave the fields blank on the service tab

title: As BOC, I want the Rookie Calculations batch to run automatically every night
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND is on the System Admin Screen
AND Last Day of Season is after current date
AND User is logged near midnight
custom_steps:
WHEN User goes to a Rookie player
AND Checks their service at midnight

OR

WHEN Time is after Last Day of Season
AND Checks their service at midnight
custom_expected:
THEN Their service should tick up 1 at midnight starting from Opening day
AND it calculates the next day based on players current roster status

OR 

THEN Time for rookie calculation does not tick up

title: As BOC, I can set a player's Super 2 year
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND has selected a Major League Player
AND Has opened up the service tab on player profile
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit on service info
AND Selects Super 2 Year Field Dropdown
AND Selects a year
AND Clicks Saves
custom_expected:
THEN Dropdown shows 3 years before and 3 years after current year
AND Super 2 Year is saved to profile

title: As BOC, I want to see a list of players who qualify for MN service this season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND is on the System Admin Screen
AND is viewing Batches Tab
AND Has player IDs for testing
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks General section maximize button
AND Adds IDs to player id parameter,separating them by commas.
AND Selects Report mode
AND Clicks Run
custom_expected:
THEN Results appear in batch results with all players who meet the population criteria to get MN service for this season
AND Minor League pro players who have had a service accruing minor league roster status at least once at any point during the current season
AND The batch results should have the following columns

**Columns for Results table:**
Player ID
Player Name
Current Org
Current Club
MJ Roster Status
MN Roster Status
Current MN Service Days

**Wireframe**
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=all_batches
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=contrat_expiration (general example)

**Service Accruing Roster Statuses**
7DL - 7 Day DL
7RH - Rehab 7 Day DL
60D - 60 Day DL
60R - Rehab 60 Day DL
ACT - Active
TI - Temporarily Inactive
